title: General Tools 188 Shower Valve Wrench Set, 5-Piece
features: 5 PIECE SET: Comes with five double end wrenches, bar handle and a bar wire holder for easy storage.
LONGER LENGTH: For access to recessed valve stems in tile covered walls.
HEX SHAPED BODY: Allows for use with an adjustable wrench.
ADDED LEVERAGE: There is also a hole near each end of the wrench for turning with a long screwdriver

GENERAL TOOLS: We're a recognized leader in designing and developing specialized precision tools dedicated to delivering exceptional customer service. We encourage artisans and DIYers to work smarter, measure better, and repair more productively.
description: Our Shower Valve Wrench Set features five professional quality wrenches with two distinct socket sizes per wrench in a double-ended design With an elongated body, the Wrenches are ideal for use on sunken valves and tile-covered shower walls The hex-shaped bodies allow for use with an adjustable wrench There is also a hole near each end of the wrench for turning with a long screwdriver The set comes with a bar handle for turning the wrenches and a wire holder for storage. Highlights: Assorted Longer length for access to recessed valve stems in tile covered walls Sizes: 21/32 x 27/32; 29/32 x 31/32; 1-1/32" x 1-3/32; 1-5/32 x 1-9/32; 1-11/32 x 1-7/16 Five piece set comes with a five double end wrenches, bar handle & a bar wire holder for easy storage
